item.title: Continually Holding Fast
item.description:
Continually Holding Fast by Elder Kevin S. Hamilton, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 183rd Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2013
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.

item.title: “Then Will I Make Weak Things Become Strong”
item.description:
“Then Will I Make Weak Things Become Strong” by Elder Kevin S. Hamilton, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 192nd Annual General Conference on Thu Mar 31 2022
